Yunchao Wei 魏云超

I am currently a Postdoc Researcher in Learning and Vision Research Group at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, National University of Singapore, directed by Jiashi Feng and Shuicheng Yan. I received PhD from Beijing Jiaotong University, advised by Zhao Yao. My research areas are computer vision, multimedia and deep learning. I am interested in multi-modal data analysis, multi-label classification, object detection and image semantic segmentation.

Research

computer vision, multimedia and deep learning

  wychao1987 AT gmail DOT com                               Google Scholar
